about_the_game:
Ninja Kiwi Archive collects some of the best-loved Flash games from the Ninja Kiwi website in one amazing archival package. Enjoy your favorite Ninja Kiwi games and discover hidden gems from over 14 years of more awesomer, preserved in their original state even after browsers stop supporting Flash.

  • An awesome collection of 60+ classic web games, stored in a time capsule.
  • Experience the forerunners to iconic games like Bloons TD 6.
  • Play the Flash version of popular Steam games like Bloons TD 5, Bloons Monkey City, Bloons TD Battles and SAS: Zombie Assault 4.
  • Log in to your Ninja Kiwi account and reclaim your progress and save games from the web.
  • Enjoy the best single and multiplayer Flash game experiences!

content_descriptors.notes: A small number of games included in the Ninja Kiwi archive contain graphic content and may not be suitable for younger players.

detailed_description:
Ninja Kiwi Archive collects some of the best-loved Flash games from the Ninja Kiwi website in one amazing archival package. Enjoy your favorite Ninja Kiwi games and discover hidden gems from over 14 years of more awesomer, preserved in their original state even after browsers stop supporting Flash.

  • An awesome collection of 60+ classic web games, stored in a time capsule.
  • Experience the forerunners to iconic games like Bloons TD 6.
  • Play the Flash version of popular Steam games like Bloons TD 5, Bloons Monkey City, Bloons TD Battles and SAS: Zombie Assault 4.
  • Log in to your Ninja Kiwi account and reclaim your progress and save games from the web.
  • Enjoy the best single and multiplayer Flash game experiences!
legal_notice: © 2020 Ninja Kiwi Limited. Bloons and Zombie Assault are registered trademarks of Ninja Kiwi Limited.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.10
  • Processor: 1.5Ghz or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Sound Card: Mac compatible
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX 10.13 or newer
  • Processor: 2Ghz or better
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Sound Card: Mac compatible

name: Ninja Kiwi Archive

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.5Ghz or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible, ATI, Nvidia or Intel HD
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2Ghz or better
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible, ATI, Nvidia or Intel HD
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card

short_description: Enjoy some of the best loved Flash games of the past in this awesome time capsule of over 60 Ninja Kiwi classics. Experience a piece of history and play the original Flash games that spawned the worldwide phenomenon of Bloons TD.
